title: Rich lamb stew with aubergine purée (Hunkar begendi)
description: This stew is spicy with a fair bit of tomato in it and cooked until the sauce is thick and unctuous, but what makes it special is the aubergine purée.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
850g/1lb 14oz boned lamb shoulder, cut into 3cm/1¼in cubes
1 green pepper, seeds removed and sliced
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
